citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 PM on
23-Jan-17.
* Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensees house. Inspector then honked GOV horn and called
telephone numbers given by the licensee. Inspector waited required 30 minute time for licensee to show up.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 PM on
23-Jan-17.
*  Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensees house.  Inspector then honked GOV horn and called
telephone numbers given by the licensee.  Inspector waited required 30 minute time for licensee to show up.  
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
